S. Narayana | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Suthivelu | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Sudhakar | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Dharmavarapu Subramanyam | |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text-align:center;"| ;Vennela Kishore | |} The Nandi Award for Best Male Comedian the award was first given in 1985. Actor Brahmanandam won the award five times, and actor Suthivelu won the award thrice. {| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" style="width:50%;" |- style="background:#d1e4fd;" !
